m_szDocTitle: Regional Energy and Efficiency Efforts | The Energy Collective
m_szDocSumamry: 12 Posted April 22, 2015 Keywords: Electricity , Energy Security , Natural Gas , Sustainability , Utilities , Environmental Policy , Cleantech , Renewables , Hydro Power , Electricity Grid , Energy , Energy and Economy , Fuels , new england , wind energy development The main purpose of this article is to show a large quantity of hydro energy can be obtained from Canada at much less cost and environmental damage to the New England economy and environment than building out wind energy on ridgelines.Â In this article, I assumed the ISO-NE energy from wind would be either 100% on shore, or 50% offs
